solution_line_template: The "ABC" books, on the other hand, were sold for a total of {num_abc_sold} * {price_abc} = $<<{num_abc_sold}*{price_abc}={earnings_abc}>>{earnings_abc}.
The difference between earnings from these two books is {earnings_top} - {earnings_abc} = $<<{earnings_top}-{earnings_abc}={difference}>>{difference}.
